column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Eventsandparticipants | Event # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Last year I got a job in downtown Atlanta .
#text=So during commute hours it takes 1-1 .5 hours to get to job .
#text=In a day , I 'll be spending 3 hours in car with nothing else to do .
#text=I checked online and found a route which is closer to where I live .
#text=I found that the best stop was right in front of my apartment complex which I had never noticed before .
#text=I need to swipe the transport 's card or pay in cash when I get into the bus .
#text=Usually there will be couple of seats vacant so I do n't need to stand .
#text=I will either sleep or read a book for the entire journey .
